name: SpendShield - Know. Control. Save.
description: SpendShield helps you Know your spending, Control your mandates, and Save your money by tracking digital subscriptions across UPI, cards, and app stores.
permissions_rationale: SpendShield requires SMS access to auto-detect recurring transaction patterns, Account Aggregator consent for banking mandates, and Contacts access to allow users to refer friends and earn days of Pro access.
